reasoning: Type 3 vWD is the rarest and most severe form (autosomal recessive). Incidence estimated at 0.1-0.5 per million population (0.0001-0.0005 per 100k) based on hemophilia treatment center registries.
source: Mannucci PM. (2004). Treatment of von Willebrand's Disease. N Engl J Med. 351:683-694
